title: Show add & sell events for all cards in History (frontend UI refresh + copy)

requirements.summary: Update History page copy/presentation to emphasize add/sell activity and ensure it refreshes after add/sell actions without hard reload.
acceptanceCriteria: All user-facing text related to the History page remains in English.
After adding a card or marking a card as sold, the History page shows the corresponding new entry without requiring a hard refresh (React Query invalidation/refetch works).
History entries for Add and Sold actions are visible and understandable to the user (label + summary + timestamp).

file_operations.description: Adjust History UI copy to clearly describe add/sell activity (title, subtitle, empty-state messaging) and (optionally) trigger a one-time history backfill when the page is opened, then refetch history so older cards also show relevant activity once backend backfill is available.

Add a React Query mutation hook (e.g., useBackfillHistoryEntries) that calls the backend backfill capability and invalidates/refetches the changeHistory query key on success; ensure it is safe to call when authenticated and actor is available.
